topics.body:
Hey guys, forgot to say my piece about the movie (Age of Ultron) I saw last night.

_It was a great movie all right, and it was totally worth seeing it, but it sure was not as good or like the first one. The thing is I expected that, but that didn't stop me from enjoying another Avengers movie._

_If the first one was between a 95%-100%, this one's at least 90%-95%. 
And that's good enough for me._

Also, [spoiler]RIP Quicksilver[/spoiler] and Ultron is best evil Tony Stark.

-But after the movie I crashed hard. It was probably the 3D or I had way too much soda to drink.-
-I blame the soda.-

But that didn't stop me, now did it?
